fields.label: English
fields.description: English translation of the example sentence.

fields.label: Grammar
fields.description: Optional short grammar/pattern tag for the sentence (e.g., 'Verb-te + ください', 'Onomatopoeia + する').

fields.label: Grammar Note
fields.description: Optional explanation of the grammar/pattern tag (e.g., register, nuance, constraints).

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Optional usage notes (nuance, register, restrictions, common collocations).

fields.label: Reference Words
fields.description: Optional array of lookup keys referencing other entry `kanji` values. When collections are loaded, matching examples can be attached to `entry.examples` by matching each refWord to `entry.kanji`.
